vocab.def: LIKE: pinch-from-chest out. DON‚ÄôT-LIKE: LIKE then flick away.
Move from temple to Y-hand; WH-face (brows down).
BECAUSE: C-from-forehead out; REASON: R-hand moves near head.
THINK: index to temple; FEEL: middle finger brushes chest upward.
GOOD: hand from chin to other palm; BAD: similar path turning down.

sections.heading: Warm-Up: Opinion Row
sections.body: Drill **LIKE**, **DON‚ÄôT-LIKE**, **FAVORITE**, **WHY?** with **neutral wrist**. Add a tiny head nod for statements; hold WH-face for **WHY?**.

callouts.title: Ergonomics
callouts.body: Relax shoulders; short breaks every 5‚Äì7 minutes.

callouts.title: Eye Gaze
callouts.body: Keep eyes on the partner‚Äôs **face**; let hands live in peripheral vision.

sections.heading: Model: Opinion + Reason
sections.body:
Use short frames: 
‚Ä¢ **I LIKE MOVIE BECAUSE FUN.** 
‚Ä¢ **I DON‚ÄôT-LIKE COFFEE REASON BITTER.** 
‚Ä¢ **MY FAVORITE MUSIC WHAT? ROCK.** Keep each clause compact; pause slightly before **BECAUSE/REASON**.

microCheck.q: Clear order for an opinion with reason:

sections.teacherNote: Encourage learners to split long thoughts into two clauses for readability.

sections.heading: Questions: YES/NO vs WHY?
sections.body:
**YES/NO (brows up):** **YOU LIKE READ?** ‚Üí **YES / NO.** 
**WH (brows down):** **WHY YOU LIKE READ?** ‚Üí **BECAUSE RELAX.**
sections.teacherNote: Spotlight brow shapes; coach a tiny head tilt for Y/N.

sections.heading: Partner Practice: Agree/Disagree
sections.body: A: **YOU LIKE TEA?** B answers. A asks **WHY?** B gives a short reason. Then partner shows stance: **I AGREE SAME.** or **I DISAGREE DIFFERENT ‚Üí BECAUSE‚Ä¶** Switch roles.

callouts.title: Polite Disagree
callouts.body: Start with **I UNDERSTAND** or **I SEE**, then your reason.

sections.teacherNote: Allow seated practice; time each exchange ‚âà20‚Äì30s.

sections.heading: Mini-Showcase
sections.body: Record **10‚Äì15s**: 1 opinion + 1 WHY-reason + 1 stance. Example: **I LIKE MUSIC ROCK BECAUSE FUN. YOU?** ‚Üí **I DISAGREE DIFFERENT BECAUSE LOUD.**
sections.teacherNote: Offer privacy submission; caption should note where WH-face improved clarity.
